entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
